pages.title: Mystic Waterborne Aura
pages.text: The Atlantisine Block emits a soothing magical aura when activated.$(br)It is crafted from rare aquatic-infused materials in a transmutation ritual and serves as a powerful aid for underwater adventures.

pages.title: Activation
pages.text: Right-clicking the block with a Hex Focus will activate it, causing the block to glow and periodically apply the Water Breathing effect to players submerged within 5 blocks.

pages.title: Deactivation
pages.text: To deactivate the Atlantisine Block, right-click it.$(br)This disables its glowing state and stops the aura.

pages.title: Growth Catalyst
pages.text: Using bonemeal on the Atlantisine Block causes aquatic flora to flourish in a wide radius.$(br)Seagrass, kelp, sea pickles, and even rare Siren Kelp may grow nearby if water is present.
